draft.title: Opportunity Draft Saved

pending_review.description: Your opportunity has been submitted and is awaiting review by our moderation team. We'll notify you once the review is complete.

published.title: Opportunity Published!
published.description: Your opportunity has been successfully published and is now visible to potential applicants on the platform.

failed.title: Opportunity Creation Failed
failed.description: We couldn't create your opportunity due to a technical issue. Please try again or contact support for assistance.

rejected.title: Opportunity Rejected
rejected.description: Your opportunity submission was rejected during the review process. Please review the feedback and make necessary corrections.

submitted.title: Application Submitted!
submitted.description: Your application has been successfully submitted. The opportunity owner will review it and get back to you soon.

under_review.title: Application Under Review

accepted.title: Application Accepted!
accepted.description: Congratulations! Your application has been accepted. The opportunity owner will contact you with next steps.

rejected.title: Application Not Selected
rejected.description: Unfortunately, your application was not selected for this opportunity. Don't give up - there are many other opportunities available.

pending_documents.title: Documents Required
pending_documents.description: Your application is on hold pending additional documentation. Please upload the required documents to proceed.
pending_documents.documentsNeeded: Please upload the requested documents to complete your application.

received.title: Submission Received
received.description: Your submission has been received and logged in our system. You will receive updates on its processing status.

processing.title: Processing Submission
processing.description: Your submission is currently being processed. This may involve validation, review, and preparation for the next stage.

approved.title: Submission Approved!
approved.description: Your submission has been approved and is ready for the next phase of the opportunity process.

requires_changes.title: Changes Required
requires_changes.description: Your submission requires modifications before it can be approved. Please review the feedback and make the necessary changes.

rejected.title: Submission Rejected
rejected.description: Your submission was rejected. Please review the feedback and consider resubmitting with improvements.

pending.title: Approval Pending
pending.description: Your opportunity is pending administrative approval. This additional review ensures compliance with our platform standards.

approved.title: Opportunity Approved!
approved.description: Your opportunity has been approved by our administrative team and is now fully active on the platform.

rejected.title: Approval Rejected
rejected.description: Your opportunity was not approved during the administrative review. Please review the feedback and address any issues.

needs_revision.title: Revision Required
needs_revision.description: Your opportunity requires revisions before it can be approved. Please review the feedback and make the necessary changes.

scheduled.title: Publication Scheduled
scheduled.description: Your opportunity is scheduled for publication. It will become visible to users at the specified time.

published.title: Opportunity Published!
published.description: Your opportunity is now live and visible to all platform users. Applicants can now discover and apply for it.

failed.title: Publication Failed
failed.description: We encountered an error while publishing your opportunity. Please try again or contact support for assistance.

unpublished.title: Opportunity Unpublished
unpublished.description: Your opportunity has been unpublished and is no longer visible to other users. You can republish it anytime from your dashboard.
